attributes.action: revers the decision to recommend StadiumMK as a stadium for use at the 2018 World Cup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The World Cup is the peak of the football World. It seems fair that the World Cup should return to England after so long. However, as the world will focus on England if the bid is a success is it right that we seem to give legitimacy to a club that wrongfully stole Wimbledons league space instead of building up a side themselves? Stand up for real fair football and don't let England be represented by a football franchise.
